code: import{useEffect}from'react';var ScrollHandler=function ScrollHandler(){useEffect(function(){var handleScroll=function handleScroll(){var $nav=document.getElementById('mainNavbar');$nav.classList.toggle('scrolled',window.pageYOffset>$nav.offsetHeight);};document.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return function(){document.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);};},[]);return null;};export default ScrollHandler;
